definition: lit. the clumsy bird flies early (idiom); fig. to work hard to compensate for one's limited abilities
stupid/foolish/silly/slow-witted/clumsy
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
variant of 屌[diao3]/penis
early/prior/former/in advance/first
to fly

sentences.english: This may sound like a no-brainer, but the early bird gets the worm.
sentences.chinese: 虽然这听起来好像很笨拙，但是“笨鸟先飞早入林”。

sentences.english: The early birds catch the worm.
sentences.chinese: 笨鸟先飞，早起的鸟才会捉到虫子。

definition: hardworking/diligent
Heaven rewards the diligent. (idiom)
you get what you put in/you reap what you sow
pinyin: yi1 fen1 geng1 yun2 , yi1 fen1 shou1 huo4

definition: one cannot achieve glory and wealth without having been through trials and tribulations (proverb)/no pain, no gain
pinyin: chi1 de2 ku3 zhong1 ku3 , fang1 wei2 ren2 shang4 ren2
related.word: 吃得苦中苦，方为人上人

definition: there is nothing the determined person can't accomplish (idiom)/persistence will overcome
pinyin: shi4 shang4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
related.word: 世上无难事，只怕有心人

definition: assiduous/taking great pains
diligent/assiduous
diligent/industrious (in one's studies)/to study hard/to make great effort
a really determined person will find a solution (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way
pinyin: you3 zhi4 zhe3 shi4 jing4 cheng2

definition: to study diligently/to train assiduously
not feel ashamed to ask and learn from one's subordinates
ten years of practice for one minute on the stage (idiom)
pinyin: tai2 shang4 yi1 fen1 zhong1 , tai2 xia4 shi2 nian2 gong1
related.word: 台上一分钟，台下十年功

definition: lit. to clasp the Buddha's feet when danger arises (idiom); fig. to profess devotion only when in trouble/doing things at the last minute/making a hasty last-minute effort
sea of learning, no horizon (idiom); no limits to what one still has to learn/ars longa, vita brevis
modest and studious (idiom)
lit. with his head attached to a beam and stabbing his thigh with an awl (idiom)/fig. to study assiduously and tirelessly
pinyin: tou2 xuan2 liang2 , zhui1 ci4 gu3
